## Source: ossf-package-analysis (576eab7ab8da7e251f8c8182b4166dc1e057daa97017c8468d268a1b059b3297)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'kratos-nextjs-react-example' @ 22.2.6 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
